did.unittitle: Brendan Muckian-Bates Posters on the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike
did.abstract: Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker. This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the strikes. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. He served as the PAC President of Monongalia County and as a delegate to the WVEA Delegate Assembly. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker.
Source: "Brendan Muckian-Bates," Keep Left Speakers, accessed April 15, 2019, http://keepleft.info/speaker/brendan-muckian-bates/.
